data.message: #Facebook  i have an idea about reporting....well i feel you should have the option to report but along with the report button it should also say and do the following "in reporting you understand that you remove yourself from the page/group/friendship" and then when they hit the report button it automatically kicks them from the said places .. so many report just to be trolls and its frustrating thank you for listining

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Angie! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Sarah
Some people just can't be happy about small things, considering.  "I'm okay, you're okay!"

Not sure if you agree or not but like I'm on many nursing pages and when the ladies get mad they start reporting people's pics even tho nursing pics are OK  by facebook standards I'm sure if this was in place there would be less reporting and when something is then it probably really may be important to look at.  :-)
Ridiculous option. Some people post nasty things that need to be reported.
Yes then you report it and Facebook takes you away from what you don't want to see and they will check into the page obviously. O0

This page is being reported non stop and still hasn't been removed
But what if it's a troll posting troll things on a page you actually like? This suggestion is stupid.
